channel.title: Rage-Scape 718/723 - Looking For Developers
channel.description:
Welcome to my thread for my project thread. I am using the Matrix 718/723 source and my goal is to load it on features and make it unique from the other Matrix leeches out there. This will be coded as a Economy/Pking server. I AM CURRENTLY LOOKING FOR DEVELOPERS, APPLICATIONS AT THE BOTTOM!
Progress Thread:
Full Dungeons/Lairs: Taverly Dungeon Brimhaven Dungeon Fremmenik Slayer Dungeon Slayer Tower Revant Cave Edgeville Dungeon Living Rock Cavern Glacors Cave Jadinko Lair Frost Dragon Lair Ancient Caverns Elite Knight Lair Ice Cave Corporeal Beast Lair Queen Black Dragon Lair King Black Dragon Lair TzHaar/Karamja Cave Lava Maze Dungeon Godwar Dungeon Kalphite Lair Skytrworm Lairs (for all 4 types) Polypore Dungeon Lumbridge Swamp Smoke Dungeon Chaos Tunnels Desert Slayer Dungeon Chaos Dwogre Battle Field
Minigames: Fight Caves Fight Kiln Dominion Tower (All 5 Modes) Crucible (Yes ;)) Sorceress' Garden Pest Control
Runespan - 90% Stealing Creations - 80% Castle Wars - 75% Puro Puro Soul Wars Clan Wars.
Combat: All combat skills add up to 138. All spells in all 3 magic books work. Normal prayers and ancient curses work. Majority of Specials work. Quick prayers function properly. Ranged and magic work from distances. 3 items kelt on death. Grim Reaper's office on death. All item's have bonuses. Combat differences in the wildy. Majority of item's have their working effects. Rapid switching and correct following. Working Kill/Death Ratio. Random Pvp drops. Gravestones upon death. You have been killed by xxx. Pvp artifacts. Few more...
Fishing/Cooking All spots around the server are fishable. Every mainstream fish can be caught and cooked. Ranges around the server can be used to cook. Things can be cooked on fires. Cavefish and Rocktail can be caught at LRC. Fishing Guild. Food burns properly. All types of fishing work. Cooking Guild - 40% Ability to catch extra fish such as lava worms, etc. Barbarian fishing (hand and heavy rod). Ability to bake cakes and every cooking food.
Woodcutting/Firemaking/Fletching/Crafting Ability to chop every tree all around the server. Ability to burn every log on the server. Gem cutting and amulet making. Hide tanning in Al Karid. Every hatchet is usable. Ability to create arrows. Clipped firemaking with fires turning to ashes. Guilds for theses. Ability to chop Ivy. Bird nests while chopping trees. Colored fires. Barbarian style log lighting. Ability to make bows, bolts, and cross bows. More crafting items that can be made.
Agility/Thieving Agility level effects running speed and duration. Resting works 100%. Gnome agility course with advanced course working. Alp npc's can be pickpocketed. Stalls work with guards and knights taking notice. Pickpocketing works completely. Wilderness and Barbarian agility courses. Pyramid agility course. Brimhaven agility minigame - 80% Lootable Chests. Random double loot pickpocketing.
Mining/Smithing/Runecrafting Ability to mine every ore on the server. All pickaxes work. Mining rune essence and pure essence. Gold and coal deposits in LRC. Mining LRC bait from dead npc's. Ability to smith every armor and weapon. All ores can be smelt. Creating dragon platebodies, dragonfire shields, godswords, dragon square shields, etc. Tiaras and talismans can be used to enter mysterious ruins. All runes can be crafted. All furnaces and irons can be used. Guilds for these. Ability to smelt cannonballs. Ability to craft multiple runes with 1 pure essense.
Herblore/Farming: Cleaning for every herb. Ability to create unfinished and normal potions. Special potions can be made including extremes, overloads, and flasks. Ability to rake and care for plots. Ability to make barbarian potions. Ability to plant all seeds. Waiting time for growing plants. Plant harvesting. Ability to create compost. Working amulet of farming. All farming plots working.
Slayer: Tureal slayer master at home. Slayer master assigns diverse tasks. Tons of slayer dungeons and the famous slayer tower. Slayer level requiring monsters. Working slayer gear. The rest of the slayer masters... Working slayer gem. Slayer rewards shop.
Construction: Ability to buy your own house. Everything else.. Building, room creating, servants, ugh....
Hunter: Working box trapping to catch chinchompas, geckos, racoons, and others. Working bird snares to catch every type of bird. Working PITFALL TRAPS to catch the spined Ability to catch butterflies with a butterfly net. Falconry for catching kebits :) Snare hunting for ferrets and others. Impling hunting and looting (Puro Puro) More pitfall trap monsters.
Dungeoneering: A few bosses. System that generates dungeons so each time you do dungeoneering its unique. Monsters in each room, need to be killed before moving on. Working keys. Dungeon completing and interface. More bosses. New floor types. Ability to create parties. Dungeoneering skilling. Smuggler store added.
Quests: Nomad's Requiem Cook's Assistant Lost City Legend's Quest Desert Treasures While Guthux Sleeps Recipee for Disaster
Random Events: Trivia Geni Lamp Rock Golem Exploding Rock Evil Chicken Evil Tree Spirit Bird Nests Shooting Stars Sandwich Lady
Other: Dicing with clan rolls. Pets, summoning and extra. Working emotes. 100% Friends chat with lootshare. Working loyalty auras. Sexy panel in the quest tab. Customizable skillcapes. Teleporting all over the world with complete cities. Grand Exchange. Working clans. Working money pouch. Prestiging system. Loads more! THE BEST ECONOMY SERVER OUT THERE!
Media: [img]http://i.imgur.com/uWRwi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ia5a0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lBVkb.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NPiam.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dp01E.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/EjsXS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/F0cLH.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/X7Z68.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rnbI1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IUFEo.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/p7Zcm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XXn69.png[/img]
Developer Application: [code]Skype: Years Coding: How Much Time Can You Commit? Past Experiences? Have You Ever Coded 667+? Other Works By You: (provide links) [/code]

@Exos wrote:

Skype: matt.slewis
Years Coding: 1
How Much Time Can You Commit? about 10 - 11 hours a day
Past Experiences? I’ve coded my own few servers
Have You Ever Coded 667+? Yes (i’m alright, hoping to get better)
Other Works By You: (provide links) None don’t show.

item.dc:creator: @owner5 owner5
item.description:
@owner5 wrote:

Hi i want to apply for website development but i only see a Java form so i will use my resume.

Can you write Html/Php:I can code HTML well and i know JavaScript well
Do you have much website knowledge:I’d say yes i go to a vocational highchool where i take 2 hours of Computer Science every day.
Position: Head Website developer, website dev, Administrator, Forums manager
Experience (Scale 1-10):9
Age:17
Time you will use a day on the server:2-4 hrs
Previous Work:CO-Owner of Deadlyscape. Admin/Website Creator of http://Sabatinoscape.tk/ (Server has shut down so i kept the home page only.
Skype:om4r321

item.title: Rage-Scape 718/723 - Looking For Developers
item.dc:creator: @hottys2good4 hottys2good4
item.description:
@hottys2good4 wrote:

Welcome to my thread for my project thread.
I am using the Matrix 718/723 source and my goal is to load it on features and
make it unique from the other Matrix leeches out there. This will be coded as a
Economy/Pking server.
I AM CURRENTLY LOOKING FOR DEVELOPERS, APPLICATIONS AT THE BOTTOM!

Progress Thread:

Full Dungeons/Lairs:
Taverly Dungeon
Brimhaven Dungeon
Fremmenik Slayer Dungeon
Slayer Tower
Revant Cave
Edgeville Dungeon
Living Rock Cavern
Glacors Cave
Jadinko Lair
Frost Dragon Lair
Ancient Caverns
Elite Knight Lair
Ice Cave
Corporeal Beast Lair
Queen Black Dragon Lair
King Black Dragon Lair
TzHaar/Karamja Cave
Lava Maze Dungeon
Godwar Dungeon
Kalphite Lair
Skytrworm Lairs (for all 4 types)
Polypore Dungeon
Lumbridge Swamp
Smoke Dungeon
Chaos Tunnels
Desert Slayer Dungeon
Chaos Dwogre Battle Field

Minigames:
Fight Caves
Fight Kiln
Dominion Tower (All 5 Modes)
Crucible (Yes ;))
Sorceress’ Garden
Pest Control

Runespan - 90%
Stealing Creations - 80%
Castle Wars - 75%
Puro Puro
Soul Wars
Clan Wars.

Combat:
All combat skills add up to 138.
All spells in all 3 magic books work.
Normal prayers and ancient curses work.
Majority of Specials work.
Quick prayers function properly.
Ranged and magic work from distances.
3 items kelt on death.
Grim Reaper’s office on death.
All item’s have bonuses.
Combat differences in the wildy.
Majority of item’s have their working effects.
Rapid switching and correct following.
Working Kill/Death Ratio.
Random Pvp drops.
Gravestones upon death.
You have been killed by xxx.
Pvp artifacts.
Few more…

Fishing/Cooking
All spots around the server are fishable.
Every mainstream fish can be caught and cooked.
Ranges around the server can be used to cook.
Things can be cooked on fires.
Cavefish and Rocktail can be caught at LRC.
Fishing Guild.
Food burns properly.
All types of fishing work.
Cooking Guild - 40%
Ability to catch extra fish such as lava worms, etc.
Barbarian fishing (hand and heavy rod).
Ability to bake cakes and every cooking food.

Woodcutting/Firemaking/Fletching/Crafting
Ability to chop every tree all around the server.
Ability to burn every log on the server.
Gem cutting and amulet making.
Hide tanning in Al Karid.
Every hatchet is usable.
Ability to create arrows.
Clipped firemaking with fires turning to ashes.
Guilds for theses.
Ability to chop Ivy.
Bird nests while chopping trees.
Colored fires.
Barbarian style log lighting.
Ability to make bows, bolts, and cross bows.
More crafting items that can be made.

Agility/Thieving
Agility level effects running speed and duration.
Resting works 100%.
Gnome agility course with advanced course working.
Alp npc’s can be pickpocketed.
Stalls work with guards and knights taking notice.
Pickpocketing works completely.
Wilderness and Barbarian agility courses.
Pyramid agility course.
Brimhaven agility minigame - 80%
Lootable Chests.
Random double loot pickpocketing.

Mining/Smithing/Runecrafting
Ability to mine every ore on the server.
All pickaxes work.
Mining rune essence and pure essence.
Gold and coal deposits in LRC.
Mining LRC bait from dead npc’s.
Ability to smith every armor and weapon.
All ores can be smelt.
Creating dragon platebodies, dragonfire shields, godswords, dragon square
shields, etc.
Tiaras and talismans can be used to enter mysterious ruins.
All runes can be crafted.
All furnaces and irons can be used.
Guilds for these.
Ability to smelt cannonballs.
Ability to craft multiple runes with 1 pure essense.

Herblore/Farming:
Cleaning for every herb.
Ability to create unfinished and normal potions.
Special potions can be made including extremes, overloads, and flasks.
Ability to rake and care for plots.
Ability to make barbarian potions.
Ability to plant all seeds.
Waiting time for growing plants.
Plant harvesting.
Ability to create compost.
Working amulet of farming.
All farming plots working.

Slayer:
Tureal slayer master at home.
Slayer master assigns diverse tasks.
Tons of slayer dungeons and the famous slayer tower.
Slayer level requiring monsters.
Working slayer gear.
The rest of the slayer masters…
Working slayer gem.
Slayer rewards shop.

Construction:
Ability to buy your own house.
Everything else… Building, room creating, servants, ugh…

Hunter:
Working box trapping to catch chinchompas, geckos, racoons, and
others.
Working bird snares to catch every type of bird.
Working PITFALL TRAPS to catch the spined
Ability to catch butterflies with a butterfly net.
Falconry for catching kebits
Snare hunting for ferrets and others.
Impling hunting and looting (Puro Puro)
More pitfall trap monsters.

Dungeoneering:
A few bosses.
System that generates dungeons so each time you do dungeoneering its unique.
Monsters in each room, need to be killed before moving on.
Working keys.
Dungeon completing and interface.
More bosses.
New floor types.
Ability to create parties.
Dungeoneering skilling.
Smuggler store added.

Quests:
Nomad’s Requiem
Cook’s Assistant
Lost City
Legend’s Quest
Desert Treasures
While Guthux Sleeps
Recipee for Disaster

Random Events:
Trivia
Geni Lamp
Rock Golem
Exploding Rock
Evil Chicken
Evil Tree Spirit
Bird Nests
Shooting Stars
Sandwich Lady

Other:
Dicing with clan rolls.
Pets, summoning and extra.
Working emotes.
100% Friends chat with lootshare.
Working loyalty auras.
Sexy panel in the quest tab.
Customizable skillcapes.
Teleporting all over the world with complete cities.
Grand Exchange.
Working clans.
Working money pouch.
Prestiging system.
Loads more!
THE BEST ECONOMY SERVER OUT THERE!
